actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to reduce from 60 to 45 the age at which a woman otherwise qualified may become entitled to widow's insurance benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Reduces from 60 to 45 the age at which a woman otherwise qualified may become entitled to widow's insurance benefits under title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to reduce from 60 to 45 the age at which a woman otherwise qualified may become entitled to widow's insurance benefits.
